title: Code Commerce
description: This is a iterative project, starting with a simple landing page and ending with a full e-commerce site. It was built using React, TypeScript, Context API, and Commerce.js.

title: SaaS Template
description: If you need an elegant, responsive, and customizable landing page for your SaaS product, this is the template for you.

title: Node Battleship
description: Do you like Battleship? Do you like Node? Well, you're in luck! This is a simple Battleship game built using Node.js and readline/sync.

title: Weather App
description: This is a simple 5 day weather forecast app built using React and the OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Folio Site
description: A portfolio template for developers and designers.

title: Superior Livestock Rebranding
description: This project is a complete overhaul and rebranding of the Superior Livestock Auction website. It was built using React, and Wordpress.
